amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to reduce the number of B-1 aircraft of the Armed Forces.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 89 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds be used to reduce the number of B-1 aircraft of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A052) offered by Mr. Neugebauer.
